name: Raj Doshi

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: Education largely focuses on teaching tools rather than learning how to create solutions to relevant problems. How to think, How to create, How to lead - these succinctly capture the abilities that modern careers will need. We built Zingle (zingle.app) as a peer-learning platform for school students (10-14yrs) where they showcase and discover new interests, interact with like minded students and feel inspired. Students' internet adoption has been cemented, yet there isn't a platform or community where they can engage with one another and get exposure to what other students learn and do.Prior to Zingle, we built business simulation games for school students to equip them with real-world skills. Why simulation games? Because they are experiential, real world based and something students love. Imagine a game-experience in which a student is running a restaurant - investing resources and taking decisions with trade-offs to maximise the revenue. Students feel super empowered.
experience.description_html: Education largely focuses on teaching tools rather than learning how to create solutions to relevant problems. How to think, How to create, How to lead - these succinctly capture the abilities that modern careers will need. We built Zingle (zingle.app) as a peer-learning platform for school students (10-14yrs) where they showcase and discover new interests, interact with like minded students and feel inspired. Students' internet adoption has been cemented, yet there isn't a platform or community where they can engage with one another and get exposure to what other students learn and do.Prior to Zingle, we built business simulation games for school students to equip them with real-world skills. Why simulation games? Because they are experiential, real world based and something students love. Imagine a game-experience in which a student is running a restaurant - investing resources and taking decisions with trade-offs to maximise the revenue. Students feel super empowered.

experience.title: Sr. Product Manager (PayU Credit)
experience.description: PaySense was acquired by PayU for $185 mn -  Led the integration of PaySense loan product with PayU's BNPL product, LazyPay, achieved 55% instant disbursals via green channel- Managed a 20-member team to develop lending partnership with Byju's Edtech, built a new app for Byju's agents, managed a tripartite integration between PaySense, Byju's, and banks. Scaled to 35% of monthly disbursals- Implemented borrower risk-based pricing of loans using ML models- Developed doc parsing and image matching tools to automate manual loan approval steps, reducing loan processing time by 50%.- Enhanced loan application process by making requirements adaptive and adding real-time in-app assistance, resulting in a 70% increase in install-to-disbursal funnel conversion (from 2% to 3.4%)- Improved touch-less repayment rate by 6% (from 79% to 85%) by introducing auto-repayment setup, flexible repayment options, and late payment charges to incentivize timely repayment behavior
experience.description_html: PaySense was acquired by PayU for $185 mn -  Led the integration of PaySense loan product with PayU's BNPL product, LazyPay, achieved 55% instant disbursals via green channel- Managed a 20-member team to develop lending partnership with Byju's Edtech, built a new app for Byju's agents, managed a tripartite integration between PaySense, Byju's, and banks. Scaled to 35% of monthly disbursals- Implemented borrower risk-based pricing of loans using ML models- Developed doc parsing and image matching tools to automate manual loan approval steps, reducing loan processing time by 50%.- Enhanced loan application process by making requirements adaptive and adding real-time in-app assistance, resulting in a 70% increase in install-to-disbursal funnel conversion (from 2% to 3.4%)- Improved touch-less repayment rate by 6% (from 79% to 85%) by introducing auto-repayment setup, flexible repayment options, and late payment charges to incentivize timely repayment behavior

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: - Perfected price discovery algorithm, simplified mobile app, and educated drivers, resulting in a 90% transition of shipments from manual sourcing to app marketplace.- Successfully led a team of 25 to grow driver base by 3x, resulting in an improvement of fulfillment rate from 75% to 95%. Recognized with an award from the CEO.- Launched personal loans ($20mn in pre-approved amount), job board, job referrals, and cashless-toll-payment solution on the app for drivers, resulting in a 40% monthly retention improvement.
experience.description_html: - Perfected price discovery algorithm, simplified mobile app, and educated drivers, resulting in a 90% transition of shipments from manual sourcing to app marketplace.- Successfully led a team of 25 to grow driver base by 3x, resulting in an improvement of fulfillment rate from 75% to 95%. Recognized with an award from the CEO.- Launched personal loans ($20mn in pre-approved amount), job board, job referrals, and cashless-toll-payment solution on the app for drivers, resulting in a 40% monthly retention improvement.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Exposure to business problems and strategic approach to solving them -Socio-economic impact assessment (Dubai) of a downstream petrochemicals project in Oman- Profiled Oman’s social and economic priorities - employment, capabilities, GDP diversification- Evaluated the socio-economic impact of the project and compared with that of other gas based industries to ascertain the best option for Oman to meet its objectives• Business Turnaround for a Telecom major in India- Conducted district-level analysis for key circles to identify issues in customer acquisition, usage and retention- Presented recommendations across product pricing, S&D, brand, network expansion to achieve revenue uplift- Prepared the annual operating plan for 2015/16• Strategy Document (Qatar) for a Qatari Chemical Marketing and Distribution Company- Estimated the total value creation potential for the company through operational savings and new initiatives- Created a corporate and functional level strategic planning document to achieve the target by 2019• Expansion Strategy for an NGO focused on girl child education in Rajasthan- Comparative analysis of intervention opportunities in pre-primary and secondary education space for the girl child- Assessed client's capabilities and aspirations to recommend the best approach and partners for its expansion• Sales Growth Strategy for the Cement brand of an Indian Steel and Cement Company- Identified existing gaps in client capability through detailed diagnostics and competitive benchmarking- Charted a prioritized list of markets and sales target plan based on market attractiveness and market intelligence• Market Entry: International expansion strategy for a European Pharma company into 4 emerging markets- Conducted market assessment for Vietnam: market size, competitive & regulatory landscape, consumer behaviour- Profiled 50+ Vietnam based companies as potential partners; short-listed and engaged with 20 high priority firms

experience.title: Intern

experience.title: Placement Manager
experience.description: I led a team of 90, was involved in making policy decisions and managing recruitment activities of 300 companies & 1400 students.Was the first non-PhD student entrusted to lead PhD Placements. I revised the process timeline to revive job prospects for the PhD students.The issue of PhD under-representation was addressed by involving the PhD Academic Unit as key stakeholders. Effected a boost in team productivity by saving manual effort of 200 hrs a month, through enhanced online systems like attendance automationComplemented student preparation by setting up centralized resource bank and cross-dept collaboration

I revised the process timeline to revive job prospects for the PhD students.The issue of PhD under-representation was addressed by involving the PhD Academic Unit as key stakeholders. Effected a boost in team productivity by saving manual effort of 200 hrs a month, through enhanced online systems like attendance automationComplemented student preparation by setting up centralized resource bank and cross-dept collaboration

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Established proof of concept of Philips healthcare model by implementing a code to simultaneously acquire data from multiple medical devices; further investigated feasibility of wireless connectivity of the devices.Program to be incorporated in Philips’ Heart Health project and planned to be launched across major Indian cities.

positions.subtitle: The Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Bombay
positions.description: Led a 2-tier team of 30+ students to network with VC funds & industry experts to mentor and fund budding start-upsBuilt relationships with 400 Mentors, Judges and 20 organizations for Eureka! - Asia’s largest B-Plan CompetitionExtended expert guidance to 800 Eureka! teams by launching query solution forum and legal consultancyIncorporated social entrepreneurship into E-Cell's vision, saw participation of 120 teams in Eureka! Social 2011Secured engagement of over 60 distinguished speakers including the likes of Sam Pitroda, Rahul Bajaj and Ronnie Screwvala for the flagship annual Entrepreneurship SummitDoubled the investor panel to 16 for Vulture’s Nest, a platform availed by 100 start-ups to pitch for funding
positions.title: Manager, Corporate Relations
positions.description_html:
Led a 2-tier team of 30+ students to network with VC funds & industry experts to mentor and fund budding start-ups
Built relationships with 400 Mentors, Judges and 20 organizations for Eureka! - Asia’s largest B-Plan Competition
Extended expert guidance to 800 Eureka! teams by launching query solution forum and legal consultancy
Incorporated social entrepreneurship into E-Cell's vision, saw participation of 120 teams in Eureka! Social 2011
Secured engagement of over 60 distinguished speakers including the likes of Sam Pitroda, Rahul Bajaj and Ronnie Screwvala for the flagship annual Entrepreneurship Summit
Doubled the investor panel to 16 for Vulture’s Nest, a platform availed by 100 start-ups to pitch for funding

people_also_viewed.name: Praneeth Bakki
people_also_viewed.about: Head, Customer Products @ Rapido | IIM Lucknow | IIT Kharagpur

recommendations: Abhinav Agarwal “Raj was one of the most active manager in the team of 22 who always went in the direction of work which will create the maximum impact, no matter how unconventional or non convincing it may sound in the beginning. He is the person who gets the job done, brilliantly, makes sure the team under him is working at the full potential and connects to the work personally.”

Shilpa Kundapur “I had the opportunity to observe Raj while he worked as an intern in Philips Research. Raj is sincere and dedicated when it comes to his work. He was unfazed when he was asked to learn a completely new topic for his project. He delved into the task with great enthusiasm and quickly picked up the fundamentals. He was able to work independently in very little time and needed little guidance, in spite of being completely new to the topic. He demonstrated the ability to think out-of-the-box and generate new ideas. He also has great communication and networking skills. Raj will be an asset to any team he works with and I wish him all the very best for the future.”
